name: Pet The Dog?
description:
FMV choose your own adventure game about petting dogs.

This game is for all lovers of petting animals.  Choose one path or the other. Pet the dog. Or do not pet the dog.  Created with a retro environment in mind, play this 356x200 FMV adventure and enjoy like it's the 90's! 

Feel free to check out my store for physical games and merch! www.TheRetroRoomGames.com

Thanks to everyone involved. This is currently available for Windows PCs and Mac OS. I hope to have a mobile port soon. Let me know if I should is expand this....and..... Should I make a "Pet the cat" game next? XD Feel free to donate to the project. All donations will go toward either my medical bills or future projects! 

CONTROLS:

Click on start to start game.

Choose to "Pet The Dog" or "Walk Away".

Thanks to Chad Armstrong for the Mac Port!
